name: Ext_R4_MedicinalProduct
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProduct for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Detailed definition of a medicinal product, typically for uses other than direct patient care (e.g. regulatory use)
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.domain from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.domain from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.combinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.combinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.legalStatusOfSupply from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.legalStatusOfSupply from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.additionalMonitoringIndicator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.additionalMonitoringIndicator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.specialMeasures from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.specialMeasures from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: If authorised for use in children
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.paediatricUseIndicator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: If authorised for use in children
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.paediatricUseIndicator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Allows the product to be classified by various systems
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.productClassification from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Allows the product to be classified by various systems
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.productClassification from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorizaton
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.marketingStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The country in which the marketing authorisation has been granted shall be specified It should be specified using the ISO 3166 ‑ 1 alpha-2 code elements
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.country from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The country in which the marketing authorisation has been granted shall be specified It should be specified using the ISO 3166 ‑ 1 alpha-2 code elements
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.country from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Where a Medicines Regulatory Agency has granted a marketing authorisation for which specific provisions within a jurisdiction apply, the jurisdiction can be specified using an appropriate controlled terminology The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.jurisdiction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Where a Medicines Regulatory Agency has granted a marketing authorisation for which specific provisions within a jurisdiction apply, the jurisdiction can be specified using an appropriate controlled terminology The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.jurisdiction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: This attribute provides information on the status of the marketing of the medicinal product See ISO/TS 20443 for more information and examples
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: This attribute provides information on the status of the marketing of the medicinal product See ISO/TS 20443 for more information and examples
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.dateRange from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.dateRange from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.restoreDate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.restoreDate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Data type name for MedicinalProduct.marketingStatus from FHIR R4
element.definition: Data type name for MedicinalProduct.marketingStatus from FHIR R4

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.packagedMedicinalProduct from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.attachedDocument from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.attachedDocument from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File)
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.masterFile from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File)
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.masterFile from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.contact from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.contact from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.clinicalTrial from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.clinicalTrial from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProduct.name from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProduct|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.
